items.title: Dear 3-1 students and families, Wishing you all a very happy Christmas, and I truly hope that 2026 becomes your best …
items.details: Dear 3-1 students and families, Wishing you all a very happy Christmas, and I truly hope that 2026 becomes your best year yet. I am so proud of each and every one of you for the hard work, growth, and positive attitude you’ve shown throughout the first semester. Please enjoy a wonderful holiday with your families. Rest well, have fun, and make lots of special memories together. I look forward to seeing you again in January—bright, refreshed, and ready for an exciting new year of learning. Warm wishes, Mr. Smith
